review: EXCELLENT streaming....easy installation. Now if I could just figure out how to connect it to my surround sound. Purchased a second because the first worked so well.
author: Centrella stacks

review: I had a little trouble setting mine up for the first time because my wireless signal wasn't very strong in the room I tried to set it up in the first time.  I once I went to a room with a string signal, set up was pretty easy.  I use it in our exercise room to stream movies while I'm on the bike, and can move it to the living room when we want to watch something there.  I highly recommend!
author: J A Cawley "JAC"

review: Easy install. Totally meets my needs
author: Eva Paticoff

review: Chromecast, along with Plex and Netflix, have allowed me to entirely do away with television service and handle all of my media-viewing needs through the magic of the Internet.Note that Amazon refuses to participate in the New World Order here, so don't expect to be able to watch any Prime streaming movies or use your Amazon music on your TV.  Silly Amazon.
author: Douglas D Manley

review: Almost no apps will work with it. Some of those that claim to do not either. Supposed to be able to play your music through it but there is no way i see possible though the app in question.
author: Michael Montandon
